name: 李有豐
objective:
本課程將介紹
1.General Principles
2.Force Vectors
3.Eguilibrium of a Particele
4.Force System Resultants
5.Eguilibrium of a Rigid Body
6.Structural Analysis
7.Internal Forces
8.Friction
9.Center of Gravity and Centroid
10.Moments of Inertia
11.Virtual Work
schedule:
第1週:Ch1.General Principles
第2~3週:Ch2.Force Vectors
第4~5週:Ch3.Eguilibrium of a Particele
第6~7週:Ch4.Force System Resultants
第8週:期中考
第9~10週:Ch5.Eguilibrium of a Rigid Body
第11~12週:Ch6.Structural Analysis
第13~14週:Ch9.Center of Gravity and Centroid
第15~16週:Ch10.Moments of Inertia
第17週:ch11.Virtual Work
18週:期末考
scorePolicy:
期中考:30%
期末考:30%
作業平時成績:40%
(出席率、遲到早退、小考、筆記及上課表現)
註:
1.作弊議處並零分
2.期末不可要求加分或減分
